Articles.Content:
I'm fairly new to KPS, started with the demo when 1.0.2 came out and bought it in the Steam 25% off sale a few days ago.

Loving the career mode and already have several mods installed.

Edited June 23, 2015 by Moh1336

Hello Moh1336, and welcome to the forums!

Version 1.0.3 just dropped yesterday in case you weren't aware.

Happy landings!
